price: ¡Qué terrible despertar les aguardaría a los que fueron advertidos, si Mi castigo se desencadenase sobre ellos [como pretenden]!
arabic: فَإِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمۡ فَسَآءَ صَبَاحُ ٱلۡمُنذَرِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā nazala bisāḥatihim fasāa ṣabāḥu al-mundharīna
